name: Guestplan Booking Widget
author: Guestplan

sections.description:
Install Guestplan Booking Widget on your website and turn visitors into guests. Blazing fast set up – only enter your API key!

Modern and minimalist widget design ensures fast loading speed without any clutter or slowdown. High conversion rates thanks to user friendly and simple user interface.

Guestplan – Reservations Done Right!

  • Available in 21 languages
  • Set your brand color
  • Support customisations
  • Accept payments
  • Seamless integration
  • Fast, secure and safe
  • 24/7 Support from Guestplan
sections.faq:
Is Guestplan free?

Yes, Guestplan is free to use for 30 days. After 30 days, you can upgrade to one of our paid plans. Please visit our pricing for more information.

Do i need a Guestplan account?

Yes, in order to manage your reservations you need a Guestplan account. You can sign up for a free account – please visit our webpage for more information.

Questions or comments?

Please send an email to help@guestplan.com and we will get back to you shortly.

Answer
